div.p: INSTRUCTIONS: This is an adaptive UoL that structures a sequence of activities that varies according to the chooses of the learner. The adaptation is based on properties that you should modify using the Properties tap on the bottom of the screen. You should also vary the resources associated to each of the questions and named with the "prefix resource-quest-..." using the Resources tab located in the overview section. The parts of the UoL that should be modified will be indicated with (TO BE COMPLETED).

The teacher has proposed two different topics to work with: T1:Topic 1(TO BE COMPLETED)or T2:Topic 2(TO BE COMPLETED) Read Carefully the contents of each of the topics and decide with your colleagues which is the one you want to work in. Use the chat widget located on the left menu for the discussion.
Select the decided topic from the list:
Comment briefly your initial ideas about the topic:
Wait until the teachers decides which is the topic for the next activity.
Your initial ideas about the topic:
The teacher has considered the final decisions of all your collegues and has choosen a topic for the activity. You can start now with the activity.
